page.title: 18Games.
page.content: { Outside Games:}Mob,Piggy-back fights, bulldogs football,netball,hide and seek,rugby,badminton,five a side soccer.{Indoor Games:}computer games,battle ship,snooker,guess who,simon,monopoly,down the hatch, snakes and ladders, prattle, bingo, scrabble,pac-man,mini-munch man. {Mob:Object of the game - }you have got to run to the mobbing post before the mobber gets you out.{Game {instructions:}Whoever is on it starts counting to 50 and all the other people hide.When the mobber has finished counting,he tries to look for everyone else.If he finds somebody, he shouts "mob"and the person's name and then"1,2,3" after they run back to the mobbing post.The person who was seen first by the mobber is "on it" in the next game.
